creator: kimliang_ng@yahoo.com
text:
I have successfully used : PropertyConfigurator.configure(Properties properties)
to configure the NTEventLogAppender and it's layout. However, in configuring 
the String Source, the column, Source, in the Windows NT Event Viewer fails to 
show the string I intended the source to be. Instead, the Source column shows 
Log4j . I don't think the syntax of the key and value pair I have used in the 
code below is wrong. 

logConfigProps.setProperty("log4j.appender.N.Source", "AppABC");

PropertyConfigurator.configure(logConfigProps);

I will appreciate a reply. Thanks.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text:
I think this is a know problem with NTEventLogAppender but I do not maintain 
this appender. I suggest you post this on the log4j-user list.
